plot: Joe Garagiola hosts this pregame show - which discusses baseball - before NBC's Monday Night Baseball telecasts in the 1970s.
title: The Baseball World of Joe Garagiola
plot_es: Joe Garagiola hosts this pregame show - which discusses baseball - before NBC's Monday Night Baseball telecasts in the 1970s.
original_name: The Baseball World of Joe Garagiola
plot_en: Joe Garagiola hosts this pregame show - which discusses baseball - before NBC's Monday Night Baseball telecasts in the 1970s.
